byline.original: By BILL CUNNINGHAM and JOANNA NIKAS

abstract: Bill Cunninham documents images of men and women in New York City wearing classic, tan peacoats.
lead_paragraph: A row of teddy bears in a window display for Valentine’s Day show the color that is already the choice of many men and women spotted in New York.

headline.main: Bill Cunningham | The Teddy Bear Coat

snippet: A row of teddy bears in a window display for Valentine’s Day show the color that is already the choice of many men and women spotted in New York.
